title: Bug 2694: Editor Selection Dialog UI suggestions
description:
Bug 2694: Editor Selection Dialog UI suggestions

Press 'Add' for the associated editors.

a. Multiple selection should be enabled.

b. The 'Add' button should not add a hidden entry.

c. The default entry in the associated editors list should be marked as '(default)' (see perspectives).

NOTES:
KLM (10/10/2001 1:54:57 PM)
Also:

f. The dialog needs a width hint.

g. Why does the File editors Pref page grow in height when it is selected, but no other pages do the same?

I currently have fixes for a, c, f and g.

Need to release.

KLM (10/10/2001 5:58:58 PM)
Released fixes for a, c, f, and g.
OB: The 'Add' button adds the entry to the associated editors list even when no entry is selected.
EB: The 'Add' button should only add the selected entry to the associated editors list.
SR:
1. Open the Editor Selection Dialog.
2. Click on the 'Add' button without selecting any entry.

Expected: The 'Add' button should be disabled if no entry is selected.

3. Select an entry from the list.
4. Click on the 'Add' button.

Expected: The selected entry should be added to the associated editors list.

5. Verify that multiple entries can be selected.

6. Verify that the default entry in the associated editors list is marked as '(default)'.

7. Open the File editors Pref page.
8. Select a different page.

Expected: The height of the File editors Pref page should remain the same.

9. Verify that the dialog has a width hint.
